description: Camera positioned far back (z=150) showing vast starfield. 2000+ tiny background stars create depth, 15 larger primary stars scattered prominently. Dark space background. Stars fade in slowly.
narration: Your universe has billions of stars. Each is unique and alive.

description: Hero star appears at center of viewport among existing stars. Camera stays at z=150 so all Scene 1 stars remain in place.
narration: You are one of them, a bright star in the vast expanse.

description: Background stars twinkle for 3s, then primary stars fade back in and constellation lines appear around hero star.
narration: Most stars twinkle distantly. A few shine close, forming constellations of meaning: family, friends, relationships.

description: Hero star travels through space. Old constellation fades, primary stars recede. Hero travels alone with twinkling background. New primary stars appear, then new constellation forms.
narration: As you orbit, interests and opportunities pull you away from familiar places. You encounter new stars and form new constellations.

description: Wave effect ripples through starfield from left to right. Stars oscillate gently as wave passes. 2-3 waves total.
narration: Unseen forces shift your trajectory—chance meetings, unexpected moments, collisions that send you toward the unknown.

description: All stars except central one fade to 30% brightness. Central star dims to 50%. Ambient light reduces. Slow, melancholy transition.
narration: At times, your light feels dim, your signal quiet. Every star experiences this space of distance and reflection.

description: Central star pulses bright (2x). Pulse wave emanates outward. Connection lines rapidly draw to distant stars. Warm glow spreads.
narration: But you have a rare gift: you can travel at the speed of love. With a thought, a message, a moment—you reconnect.

description: All stars flare to 150% brightness. Constellation lines glow bright. Warm color tint (#ffeecc) overlays scene. Quick, joyful transition.
narration: The gravity, warmth, and light of connection return—instantly.

description: Camera pulls back to z=200 over 3s. Constellation pattern morphs to form logo shape. Logo image fades in center at 80% opacity.
narration: Relation Star helps you explore, nurture, and navigate the constellations that make your world shine.
